msg: added threshold tests to property configurator

author: damien
msg: Fix for problem where HEAD requests that would have a chunked responses would send the chunked respone anyway. Also, we now avoid processing the request, and instead abort it as soon as the header is sent.

author: grobmeier
msg: LoggerXmlConfigurator can now understand threshold attributes at appender level

author: damien
msg: Fix for problem where HEAD requests that would have a chunked responses would send the chunked respone anyway. Also, we now avoid processing the request, and instead abort it as soon as the header is sent.
